inclusion.criterion: documented diagnosis of breast cancer based on physical examination, imaging and histopathology
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: possibility of obtaining blood samples from the subject
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: All patients with prior history of exposure to chemotherapy, radiotherapy or hormonal therapy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: patients with missed documentation for histopathological diagnosis of breast cancer
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 42 year-old postmenopausal woman with a history of breast cancer, HER2-positive and ER/PR negative. She has no other malignancies or chronic inflammatory diseases.
